document.full_text: u.n. and french helicopters attacked forces loyal to incumbent ivory coast leader laurent gbagbo late into sunday night, damaging the presidential residence and destroying heavy weapons that u.n. chief ban ki-moon ordered silenced.
document.title: u.n., french attack gbagbo heavy weapons in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: u.n. and french helicopters attacked forces loyal to incumbent ivory coast leader laurent gbagbo late into sunday night, damaging the presidential residence and destroying heavy weapons that u.n. chief ban ki-moon ordered silenced.
